DOC.brief_title: A Study Of SB-751689 , Atorvastatin , Ketoconazole , And Rosuvastatin In Health Postmenopausal Women .
DOC.criteria: Healthy ambulatory postmenopausal woman define amenorrheic least 2 year Nonsmoker Weight > 110 lb ( > 50 kg ) Body mass index within range 19 29.9 kg/m2 capable give write informed consent Have clinically relevant abnormality identify screen history physical laboratory examination , 12lead surface electrocardiogram ( ECG ) and/or 24 hour Holter , include QTc > 450 msec Test positive urine drug screen alcohol Test positive HIV , hepatitis B virus hepatitis C virus Smoker history smoking use nicotine containing product within one year study > 10 packyear history smoke overall history regular alcohol consumption exceed 7 units/week ( 1 unit = 5 ounce wine 12 ounce beer 1.5 ounce hard liquor ) within 6 month screen history drug abuse within 6 month study participate trial investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) precede first dose study medication use prescription nonprescription drug ( include calcium tablet , calcium contain antacid , aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ) , vitamin , herbal dietary supplement , within 14 day prior first dose study medication . consume grapefruit contain product within 14 day prior first dose study medication donate blood excess 500 mL within 56 day prior dose evidence kidney liver disease history significant gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal surgical procedure sensitive study medication component thereof history cardiovascular disease medical condition might alter bone metabolism serum parathyroid hormone ( iPTH ) test , vitamin D level outside normal range
